items.sentence: I've decided to go to Australia next summer.
I thought you said this was going to be fun.
It was obvious Tom didn\'t want to kiss Mary.
It was obvious that Tom didn\'t want to sing.
He really likes science fiction novels a lot.
He received quite a few letters this morning.
He saw Tom leave before the job was finished.
He seems to have been poor when he was young.
He uses foul language whenever he gets angry.
He was absent from school because of illness.
Tom wants to marry Mary and John\'s daughter.
I haven\'t talked to Tom for quite some time.
Burn this letter after you finish reading it.
By this time tomorrow, Tom will be in Boston.
Can I have two hamburgers and a coke, please?
Can I tempt you to try another piece of cake?
Can Tom really speak French better than Mary?
Tom told me that he wasn\'t afraid of ghosts.
Tom told me that he wasn\'t scared of snakes.
I\'d be unhappy, but I wouldn\'t kill myself.
